text: Removing control characters from a string in python
I currently have the following code

code:
def removeControlCharacters(line):
    i = 0
    for c in line:
        if (c < chr(32)):
            line = line[:i - 1] + line[i+1:]
            i += 1
    return line

text: This is just does not work if there are more than one character to be deleted.
